For the latest details and information on #floodrisk management schemes across the #NorthWest, visit @TheFloodHub on the link below ‚¨áÔ∏è:
https://t.co/RMUcu2hKbt 

#ReducingFloodRisk @EnvAgencyNW #NWEngland https://t.co/2EbwOzGexk

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency The EA will  take onboard their station readings and Red Industries will follow suite. What is EA's stance on trapped H2S build up in properties that creates a greater concentration?

Defra confirms Turkish import restrictions - 
https://t.co/Ao8YMTjBdU

Also noticed the odour breach- was pleased to see it. However they‚Äôve had daily odour breaches since time began so it actually annoys me that they officially only have one! #stopthestink @EnvAgency https://t.co/lFtXVxluYi
@EnvAgencyMids @LincolnshireCC @LincsCC_roads @EastLindseyDC https://t.co/wg0nml9jCs
@EnvAgencyMids @LincolnshireCC @LincsCC_roads @EastLindseyDC https://t.co/xSGoTjH7KN

Our latest #WalleysQuarry update is now live. Read it here ‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/ylefAJ5mn0

We are challenging the operator every step of the way to take action to reduce the odour levels from their operations & the impact these are having on the local community

#NewcastleUnderLyme https://t.co/2GBqg2AQHY

This is effluent entertaining the Gaywood River at Bawsey King‚Äôs Lynn in 2018 from a overflowing lagoonü§¨It went on for so long that it cut a gorge into the river bankü§¨@EnvAgencyAnglia didn‚Äôt bother to prosecuteü§¨@GlavenEel @CharlieJGardner @WasteCrimeWatch @Feargal_Sharkey https://t.co/EV6fx6fozA https://t.co/eJ0thPYFlV
@tw33tie1 @StinkStopthe @SianieRoo @EnvAgency Plus once it's inside it doesn't leave, stays for hours after outside has cleared.

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency And the odorous gas gets trapped in houses until we can ventilate them, which we can't do until it's fully gone from outside üòî We are breathing in poisonous odour for hours and hours every day.

@EnvAgencyMids The ‚Äòlatest‚Äô is same as ever. EA identifies breaches, issues compliance deadline and nothing improves. How long these useless deadlines which only give the operator longer to fill their coffers (probbefore the inevitable happens) and they leave the site. Step in now EA & CAP IT!

This afternoon our Chair @Dunne4Ludlow is hosting a debate on the future of the Green Homes Grant voucher scheme in Westminster Hall

üíª Watch live from 3:15pm
https://t.co/UjMDSdfQoE

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids How about stopping operations until they are compliant at the very least? Your allowing a company to accept further waste onto a site which has been found in breach of 10 regulations and all they‚Äôve been seen to of done is hire a Relations Manager... How can you justify this?

"In my view, the Environment Agency is not fit for purpose right now - and Defra is just ignoring the problem", said Glyn Marshall. 

The @EnvAgency "declined to be interviewed".

Thus proving Glyn's point. @JournoChar @ITVCentral https://t.co/OVWAdu6hlT

tweets.text:
Earlier this year, @EnvAgency trialed Citizen Jury‚Äôs in three areas to involve communities in decisions about their local #river. Read about the #citizen jury recommendations for South #Chilterns and #Thames rivers here. Brilliant thoughtful experience. 

https://t.co/FFJuduA81I

I agree, the @EnvAgency monitors only pick up the levels at that exact location.The gas seems to form a cloud which blasts certain areas,it can sit there or carry on to somewhere else.The monitors just don‚Äôt pick that up or interior of houses #stopthestink We are being poisoned https://t.co/mO2eclzxnp
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Can you tell me how we can listen to the call please @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA

Different story. Same message. 
@DefraGovUK has ignored the environmental vandalism is Newcastle Staffs this entire time & the @EnvAgency may be moving now but it‚Äôs still far too slow & too little too late for the thousands of ill residents #stopthestink https://t.co/Uiy39VJJcZ

A highlight of the natural flood management community of practitioners event is a virtual site visit to @UniversityLeeds Brownlee Triathalon Centre to showcase innovative #NFM techniques. @LeedsFAS working with @EnvAgencyYNE 

Thurs 10 June, 10am ‚Äì 1pm https://t.co/QXNOqg9F3w https://t.co/JBxS4Yy33o

The @EnvAgency needs to get control of the vile stench from @WalleysL owned by @Redindustries2. I have had some rest bite from the odour inside my home by installing a system from @clenzair. It‚Äôs been highly effective, using NPBI technology to neutralise the H2S. #stopthestink

@dizzyblonde53 @SuzVW @davemh72 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @NewsNBC I worry that they have a good idea what's in there & don't want to deal with the consequences & compensation that investigating would trigger, either way residents screwed, we need to act fast, EA never going to act, where are council?
@EnvAgency @pow_rebecca @MPGeorgeEustice more permit breaches. Explain again why you can‚Äôt force @RedIndustries2 to suspend operations until the problem is dealt with? https://t.co/zc6sUPeAep

@StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids Great news ( well not for us ) our taxes pay your exhorbitant salaries at the top of @EnvAgency .

@JuliaBradbury @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @MattHancock @guardian @Independent Thanks for your support. I work nearby, or did. I now work from home as the stench is horrific most days. I sometimes smell it 6 miles away at home too.

tweets.text: Met with @EnvAgencyYNE today to discuss natural flood management works at Broughton nr Skipton. Modelling for the Upper Aire catchment shows conclusively that here, of all the NFM interventions, tree planting and soil aeration will have the greatest effect on reducing flood risk https://t.co/27oUTnFDYL
@DrMariaNeira Please help us Dr Neira, MPs and @EnvAgencyMids minimising misery of a whole town

2/2 units on the industrial estate are casuing this and need investigating but we get fobbed off saying its washing away naturally......no it isnt. Its been weeks now and happens every year. This is the worst its been. There used to be ducklings but theyve gone too. https://t.co/WZXXIp8bhT

@PHE_uk Why does your report say that MMF1 is not monitoring for H2S yet @EnvAgency are giving a figure for the the H2S monitored from this machine? What's going on? #stopthestink #capitoff https://t.co/piZaOEu3xo
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency @JournoChar @ITVCentral Allowing the water to be poisoned, allowing the air to be poisoned. What are we paying these people for? #stopthestink.

@NickMincher @EnvAgencyMids Agreed. I have no idea why a methane flux box survey is going to take another 4 months. Also, if they were serious about getting a solution as quickly as possible, then all waste acceptance should be halted to avoid it being a distraction to the remedial work.

Is the @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA hero the mayor who kept the beach open in Jaws? @RedIndustries2 continue to destroy lives,health & businesses @NewsNBC.The toxic gas is out of control,no planned end date,is this regulation? @pow_rebecca @BorisJohnson @AaronBell4NUL #stopthestink https://t.co/22B98gKN2w
